categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: "The Fantastic Technology Contest" was a contest held by West End Games and the Role Playing Game Association that allowed players of Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game to submit various examples of technology; winning entries were included among the items released in Galladinium's Fantastic Technology. Out of about seventy-five submissions, nearly half were included in the book, with first place going to Michael Zebrowski for his Repulsor Grappling Gun.
